_header: Beth all glad and merry that sitteth at this mess
Subjects: occasional verse; marriage, festal verses for
_description: A sotelty for a bridal feast — one couplet

BodLatMisC66.Transcription:
beith all gladd and mery that sittith at this messeand prayeth for
                    the kyng and all his…
